Definition: Descriptive sample identifier indicating sampling site and date, core number and sampling depth.

Experimental field plot replicate number. Each numberc corresponds to a pair of plots, where one was heated by 4 degree Celsius above ambient temperature and the other was not; see variable Field_Treatment.
Soil depth interval, below the surface.
Experimental temperature regime of the  field plot: Heated, soil plot heated by 4 degree Celsius above ambient temperature; or Control, unheated control soil plot.

Nutrient amendment to soils at the beginning of the incubation: Control, no amendment; C, carbon amendment (cellulobiose); NP, nitrogen and phosphorus co-amendment (ammonium and phosphate); CNP, carbon, nitrogen, and phosphorus co-amendment (cellulobiose, ammonium, and phosphate)
Respiration rate at day 1 of incubation. Missing data = -9999
Respiration rate at day 3 of incubation. Missing data = -9999
Respiration rate at day 8 of incubation. Missing data = -9999
Respiration rate at day 16 of incubation. Missing data = -9999
Respiration rate at day 28 of incubation. Missing data = -9999
Cumulative respiration during the 28 day incubation. Missing data = -9999
Ammonium concentration at day 1 of incubation. Missing data = -9999
Ammonium concentration at day 28 of incubation. Missing data = -9999
Nitrate concentration at day 1 of incubation. Missing data = -9999
Nitrate concentration at day 28 of incubation. Missing data = -9999
Microbial carbon use effciency at day 28 of incubation. Missing data = -9999
Net N mineralization rate during the incubation. Missing data = -9999
